title: Pakistan proved as responsible nuclear state: Shazia Marri
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 20 (APP):Pakistan Peoples Party’s central spokesperson Shazia Marri said that Pakistan is a responsible nuclear state and the Pakistan Army by giving a befitting reply to India in a professional manner proven to the world that it has the full capability to crush the evil intentions of the enemy.
Talking to the media outside the Parliament House, she said that Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, along with a high-level parliamentary delegation, unveiled the truth about the Pahalgam incident to the world during his 11-day foreign tour and exposed the hideous face of India.
Shazia Marri said that Bilawal Bhutto Zardari will be given a grand welcome upon his return from a successful tour. Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, along with a high-level parliamentary delegation, made an 11-day tour of various countries including the United States of America.
He successfully completed the mission entrusted by Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif to the former Foreign Minister and the young leadership of Bilawal Bhutto Zardari.
Accomplished, the delegation held a total of 64 high-level meetings, including meetings with US members of parliament, think tanks, and diplomatic missions, and informed the entire world about the Indian false flag operation and its aggression and illegal unilateral actions to abrogate the Indus Waters Treaty.
On the other hand, India also sent a delegation that was seen eating and singing with the people of its community and no think tank listened to their voice.
Shazia Marri said that they have been saying since day one that the Pahalgam incident was a false flag operation. Modi’s case is just propaganda while Pakistan’s case is true.
Bilawal Bhutto said that we want peace, Pakistan is the only country that wants to end terrorism while India has always conspired through fabricated statements. Now the world has come to know the truth about India. Shazia Marri said that after a long time, the world is taking Pakistan seriously. Shazia Marri said that Bilawal Bhutto also had 17 meetings with the international media and Bilawal Bhutto’s arrival is expected today after this successful visit, for which people are in a crowd in Karachi to welcome him. Pakistan People’s Party spokesperson said that he had gone to fight the case of Pakistan as a Pakistani. Bilawal Bhutto has raised Pakistan’s head with pride.  What is it? – Shazia Marri said that we are proud of our Pakistani forces, who have demonstrated their capabilities. We are confident that our defense is strong. – Bilawal Bhutto was the youngest Foreign Minister. Considering his diplomatic skills, Prime Minister Muhammad Shahbaz Sharif formed a parliamentary delegation under his leadership, for which we are also grateful to the Prime Minister. – Bilawal Bhutto and his team met with important countries for 11 days. During his visit to the United States, he met with 25 members of the US Senate and Congress. – Bilawal Bhutto Zardari also condemned the ongoing barbarity in Gaza and expressed solidarity with the Palestinians. Bilawal Bhutto also condemned the recent Israeli aggression against Iran and expressed solidarity with the people of Iran.
